name: ShooTarget 3
description:
ShooTarget 3 

Is a game where you should shoot targets like in shooting stand.
The goal is to hit targets the quickly as possible.

---------------------CONTROLS------------------------

W or UpArrow = Move
W or UpArrow + LeftShift = Running
S or DownArrow = Move Forward
Q or LeftArrow = Move Left
D or RightArrow = Move Right
LeftClick = Shooting
RightClick = Aimming
